**Secretary of Agriculture, Tourism and the Environment of Guapiara (SP) (2009-2010)** 
The county is one of the last counties in the State of São Paulo that has the majority of the population in the rural area. Moreover, it harbors part of the largest remnant of the Atlantic Forest, therefore, presents great challenges to the sustainable development. <p>
Main activities: <p>
- Sustainable agricultural practices project (80,000.00 R$/annually)
- Volunteer database of restoration areas
- Agricultural technical assistance (2 agronomic engineers, 1 veterinary, 3 agricultural technicians, 6 tractor operators and 1 tractor team coordinator) - 1300 families, budged of around 600,000.00R$/annually. 
- Responsible for the public agricultural marker (20 employees involved, 350 tons/week) <p> 
- Project for Payment of Ecosystem Services <p>
- Project to create a state park in the municipality <p>

Continuity of the projects from when it was Secretary of Agriculture and Supply
